recommendations.title: Criminal Investigator
recommendations.description: Conduct investigations, gather evidence, and interview witnesses to solve crimes while working with law enforcement agencies.
roles: Conduct investigations, analyze crime scenes, and collect evidence.
Prepare case reports and testify in court.
Work with law enforcement and legal professionals.
Monitor criminal activities and assess security threats.
Use forensic tools, databases, and surveillance methods in investigations.
Interview witnesses, victims, and suspects to gather crucial information and uncover case details.

Basic Skills: Conducting legal research and case analysis
Technical Skills: Crime mapping and predictive policing (GIS, IBM i2)

Critical Thinking: Analyze cases, evidence, and suspects logically.
Communication: Report writing, courtroom testimony, and public speaking.
Problem-Solving: Assess crime patterns and develop investigative strategies

Personality.Description: Examine, analyze, and assess crime-related information to ensure justice, maintain security.

Technology: Crime analysis software (GIS, IBM i2 Analyst's Notebook)
Surveillance tools and digital forensics (CCTV, EnCase, Cellebrite)
Criminal databases (NCIC, AFIS, CODIS)
Body-worn cameras and forensic imaging
Monitors suspect movements and gathers location-based evidence

Job Outlook.Description: New job opportunities are very likely in the future

Skills Gap: Minimal Practical, Hands-On Experience Data & Intelligence Gathering

recommendations.title: Forensic Analyst
recommendations.description: Analyze crime scene evidence, DNA, and digital forensics to assist in solving cases. Work in laboratories or with law enforcement.
roles: Create technical documentation, training materials, and user guides for IT teams.
Design and optimize enterprise software, cloud infrastructure, and IT workflows.
Ensure IT security, compliance, and risk management across business systems.
Analyze and assess business and IT needs to recommend technology solutions.
Design and optimize enterprise software, cloud infrastructure, and IT workflows.
Develop data-driven reports to support decision-making and automation
Collaborate with developers, analysts, and stakeholders to improve systems.

recommendations.description: Assess threats, analyze criminal data, and support national security or law enforcement agencies with intelligence reports.

recommendations.description: Supervise offenders, ensure institutional security, and assist with rehabilitation programs in correctional facilities.
